title: AI chatbots can fall for prompt injection attacks, leaving you vulnerable - The Washington Post
translated_title: ai chatbots can fall for prompt injection attacks leaving you vulnerable  the washington post
summary: Prompt injection is a type of cyberattack against AI-powered programs that take commands in natural language rather than code. Attackers might ask the AI tool to read and summarize confidential files, steal data or send reputation-harming messages. So far, cybersecurity researchers aren’t aware of any successful prompt injection attacks.

title: AI twice as accurate as a biopsy at grading aggressiveness of some ... - The Institute of Cancer Research
translated_title: ai twice as accurate as a biopsy at grading aggressiveness of some   the institute of cancer research
summary: Researchers from The Royal Marsden NHS Foundation Trust and The Institute of Cancer Research, London, used CT scans to create an AI algorithm. Researchers believe the technique could be eventually applied to other cancer types too, potentially benefitting thousands of patients.
